title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Added enterprise-managed custom organization roles for GitHub Enterprise Cloud and Server 3.19+, allowing centralized role creation (up to 20 roles).
Increased custom organization/repository role limits to 20 (from 10/5) for GitHub Enterprise Server 3.19+.
Updated Gemini 2.5 Pro model status to Generally Available (GA) in GitHub Copilot.
Added `data-search` attribute to fix search indexing for category landing pages.

- Updated Gemini 2.5 Pro model status to Generally Available (GA) in GitHub Copilot.
- Added `data-search` attribute to fix search indexing for category landing pages.

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Added enterprise-managed custom organization roles for GitHub Enterprise Cloud and Server 3.19+, allowing centralized role creation (up to 20 roles).
- Increased custom organization/repository role limits to 20 (from 10/5) for GitHub Enterprise Server 3.19+.
- Updated Gemini 2.5 Pro model status to Generally Available (GA) in GitHub Copilot.
- Added `data-search` attribute to fix search indexing for category landing pages.
